name: @swellaby/azp-bump-tests
description: functional tests for our azp-bump module

scripts.pretest: npm run clean && mkdir .testcontext && ncp test/fixtures/ .testcontext/lib/ && ncp test/fixtures/ .testcontext/cli/
scripts.dev:reset: npm run clean && node -e "require('rimraf').sync('node_modules');" && npm run dev:setup
